name: financial_advisor
description: AI-powered Financial Advisor that helps users make informed financial decisions through market research, portfolio analysis, risk assessment, and personalized recommendations.

skills.name: Stock Price Lookup
skills.description: Get current stock prices and basic market data for any symbol

skills.name: Market Summary
skills.description: Get overall market conditions including major indices and sentiment

skills.name: Portfolio Analysis
skills.description: Analyze investment portfolio composition, diversification, and sector allocation

skills.name: Risk Assessment
skills.description: Evaluate portfolio risk including VaR calculation and stress testing

skills.name: Investment Recommendations
skills.description: Provide data-driven investment recommendations based on analysis

skills.name: Financial Calculations
skills.description: Perform financial calculations including compound interest, ROI, and Sharpe ratio
